org.apache.flink.api.common.state

接口 MergingState<IN,OUT>

  • 类型参数:
    IN - Type of the value that can be added to the state.
    OUT - Type of the value that can be retrieved from the state.
    所有超级接口:
    AppendingState<IN,OUT>, State
    所有已知子接口:
    ListState<T>, ReducingState<T>

    @PublicEvolving
public interface MergingState<IN,OUT>
extends AppendingState<IN,OUT>
    Extension of AppendingState that allows merging of state. That is, two instances of MergingState can be combined into a single instance that contains all the information of the two merged states.

    • 方法概要

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.flink.api.common.state.AppendingState

        add, get

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State

        clear
